channel.title: How to: make an NPC teleport or go through with a command after its death? [317]
channel.description:
Where would i look? The topic subject says it all.
Help is greatly appreciated! :D
Ex; Monster dies, you are teleported to Varrock's coords and are given 50k, or something:)
(317 server)
